name: Box Inc.
description:
Welcome to Box Inc.

Build up your Empire and become the King of  Cardboard boxes. Who needs Water ? Who needs Air ? With the rise in Online Shipping, Cardboard Boxes are the only future.

 It's really small, its really pointless... But its an Android Clicker Game that lets you rule over your own Cardboard Planet. Made in  about 2 hours some time ago.

I will upload a Html5 Version as soon as i remember where i saved the project files...
